# Nelexa\GPlay\Model\GoogleImage::setWidthAndHeight
`Nelexa\GPlay\Model\GoogleImage::setWidthAndHeight` â€” Sets the width and height of the image.

## Description

## Parameters

* **$height** (int)
